landing.title: Azure Media Services
landing.valueProp: Azure Media Services is an API that enables developers to build low latency live and on-demand video experiences

section.1.title: A full, end-to-end solution
section.1.description: Azure Media Services is a full solution that manages the ingestion, transcoding, packaging, and delivery of your live content, the same technology that powers Teams and LinkedIn.

section.2.title: Make your live content accessible, with real-time transcription
section.2.description: Automatic real-time transcription in 100+ languages without sacrificing latency.

section.3.title: Uncompromising commitment to privacy and security
section.3.description: Protect your content from upload to playback. Enable your viewing restrictions with Digital Rights Management, Geo-blocking, and URL token signing.

section.4.title: Low latency live streaming at global scale
section.4.description: 4-7 seconds of delay, delivered to all your viewers, devices and platforms. Whether itâ€™s a dozen to millions of streams, you can rest assured your viewers will always watch with less buffering and watch your live streams near-realtime.

0.title: Enterprise
0.headline: Collaborate together
0.body: Help coworkers work closely together in this new hybrid environment. Have more interactive discussions pushing along the product roadmap.

1.title: Live shopping
1.headline: Sell your products
1.body: Empower your sellers to connect with their audience whether it be upvotes or instant advertising of new products. Influential connections mold a brand in seconds.

2.title: Fitness
2.headline: Stay fit together
2.body: Connect your athletes to one another. Build a leaderboard for everyone to keep track of their core movements.

3.title: Government
3.headline: Engage your community
3.body: Ensure legislators with strong transparency and help them build public trust. Government officials now can feel more connected to join process decision-making.

4.title: Education
4.headline: Create learning hubs
4.body: Elevate online learning with more interactivity. Inspire students to push their learnings with in-depth calls, raise their virtual hands, and foster their creativity.

5.title: Energy
5.headline: Deliver a clean energy future
5.body: Inspire conference attendees to ask more questions and get hands on with the conference speakers. Build on the personal connection and dive deep into climate and clean energy.

6.title: Healthcare
6.headline: Empower patients
6.body: Provide virtual care for patients and providers to get the best remote health care and avoid the unnecessary in-person contact. Give accessible care quickly and easily.

7.title: Manufacturing
7.headline: Improve production quality
7.body: From the production line equipment to products, capture real time footage and data for a more efficient supply chain. Live stream with robotics for remote welding operations.

2.title: Wide-range of input file formats
2.description: We accept many types of input video files

3.title: Test assets
3.description: Try any feature with our test assets for any non-production environment

4.title: Clipping
4.description: Clip any live or on-demand video to any length you want

5.title: Stream live
5.description: Go live easily. Get the RTMP input URL and go

6.title: RTMP/RTMPS Input
6.description: Supports RTMP and RTMPS protocol for simple integration with live streaming software like OBS

7.title: Live captions
7.description: Real-time transcription in 50+ languages without sacrificing latency

tryFree.title: Try Azure Media Services for free
tryFree.description: Start with a free account for up to 20 minutes of free file encoding. For unlimited encoding and live streaming, create an Azure Media Services account with your own Azure subscription.
